name: drain messages without timeout
body:
-  fix table setup race condition to just drain the errors/messages channels without timeout by @kskitek in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/390

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lovoo/goka/compare/v1.1.5...v1.1.6

name: improve iterator memory usage
body:
## What's Changed
* no cache on iterator, remove unused snapshot by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/389


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lovoo/goka/compare/v1.1.5...v1.1.6

name: v1.1.5 Update Sarama dependency
body:
v1.32.0 of Sarama was retracted by Shopify because it has an issue with the producer hanging when given an empty producer message.

Therefore we're updating to 1.33.0

name: v1.1.4
body:
v1.1.4 Fix Memory Leak In Goka Visitor
* bugfix duplicate channel creation on every message visit by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/387


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lovoo/goka/compare/v1.1.3...v1.1.4

name: v1.1.3 fixing examples and logging
body:
## What's Changed
* github action for installing goka by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/373
* Fix examples initialization after auto creation of topics is disabled by @norbertklawikowski in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/384
* inherit debug logging to custom loggers, fixes issue #382 by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/383
* Run examples as GitHub actions, fixes issue #379 by @norbertklawikowski in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/385

## New Contributors
* @norbertklawikowski made their first contribution in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/384

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lovoo/goka/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.3

name: v1.1.2
body:
## What's Changed
* bugfix backoff: add max-wait, actually use parameter by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/367
* issue #355, add lock for memory-storage by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/368
* bugfix #371, updated sarama v1.27.0 -> v1.32.0 by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/372


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lovoo/goka/compare/v1.1.1...v1.1.2

name: Hotfix Rebalance shutdown
body:
## What's Changed
* chore(ci): add GH actions by @mavogel in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/357
* github actions: remove integration-test, remove travis, add readme-badge by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/365
* **hotfix**: rebalance should not shut down processor by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/366

## New Contributors
* @mavogel made their first contribution in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/357

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lovoo/goka/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

name: v1.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Example for defer commit by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/301
* Improve goka.Context docs by @adw1n in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/303
* fixed tests by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/309
* Initial support for headers in tester by @wwaldner-amtelco in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/308
* issue #312 append headers on emit instead of replacing them by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/313
* #156 processor hot standby by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/283
* Improve headers implementation by @mrahs in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/315
* Bugfix draining consumer message. by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/319
* Expose headers via the root package by @mrahs in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/324
* Remove Prefix from logging, moved logging package to goka #305 by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/310
* add go report card by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/326
* storage improvements by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/328
* Added GetTableKeys to tester by @juandes in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/327
* tester.Catchup() added, removed partitions in tester.Topicmanager by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/333
* hotfix: panic after activating debug logging by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/336
* partition table: always store offset by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/337
* Fix TopicManager docstring replication factor by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/340
* #318 avoid losing an element in leveldb seeker by @mrahs in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/320
* Visitor Tool implementation by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/341
* fixed comments from PR #341, added unit tests for action by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/345
* topic manager wait by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/348
* improving processor error handling/shutdown by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/353
* Expose Processor State With StateReader Interface by @jomaresch in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/354
* skip nil-values for partitions where stats timed out by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/358
* Add setter functions to allow changing `tableSuffix` and `loopSuffix`. by @chin8628 in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/359
* tester: implement listing topics and partitions + getoffset by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/360
* Improved failure handling fully remove multierr.Errors system test for testing connection errors bugfix issue 350 View.Get fails on reconnecting view bugfix processor freeze on error (334) by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/361
* Visitor/Tests imrovement by @frairon in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/363

## New Contributors
* @wwaldner-amtelco made their first contribution in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/308
* @juandes made their first contribution in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/327
* @chin8628 made their first contribution in https://github.com/lovoo/goka/pull/359

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lovoo/goka/compare/v1.0.6...v1.1.0

name: change loop/table suffix
body: Small fix that allows modifying loop/table suffixes when generating the group graph.

name: nil pointer fix in stats
body: Bugfix: ignore stats for partitions where fetch-stats timed out (was set to nil before)

name: error handling + shutdown
body:
* Improved error handling and processor shutdown on failure. 
  Solves issue #330 , #334 
* Use `hashicorp/go-multierror` instead of `multierr.Errors`.

name: headers, logging, visitor
body: Pre-release of breaking changes regarding header handling and logging.

name: header options + topicmanager fixes
body:
Improvements
* add sending headers option to context by @AlecY 
* topic manager check topic configuration with configurable behavior on mismatch

name: bugfixes + tester improvements
body:
Bugfixes

* leveldb ressource leak by @mrahs 
* fix race conditions
* avoid panic by removing direct storage access in view

Improvements
* unexport finish method of promise
* print consumer errors only once
* add getter for Graph-Group in context
* tolerate different sets of topics

Random
* remove logo for ASF tradmark violations

name: Tester: fix concurrent map access
body: - add mutex to codex-map in tester to prevent concurrent map access

name: Log-Prefix, Emitsync with headers & Bugfix
body:
* Add EmitSyncWithHeaders to Emitter (by @adw1n)
* Prefix sarama logger with [Sarama] (by @adw1n)
* Bugfix in example (by @FredrikBakken)

name: Fix Monitoring Issue
body: Fixing the processor and view state in the monitoring web-ui.

name: Fix issue with sarama 1.27.0
body: Add Commit() to MockConsumerGroupSession and cgSession to be compatible with ConsumerGroupSession interface.

name: Sarama consumer group
body: With this release we integrate sarama consumer group into goka and remove the sarama-cluster dependency. These changes enable users to use goka with recent sarama versions.

name: bugfix stats tracking
body:
removed race condition in stats tracking
fixed panic in View.Get for uninitialzed state
call Open on storage after init

name: Consumer Group Refactoring
body:
Major changes:

* Removed sarama-cluster, replaced with sarama's ConsumerGroup
* remove package kafka, move remaining files to root
* introduce go mod
* removed support for librdkafka

See #239  for details
